articles.author: Brad Lendon
articles.title: Trump is moving nuclear submarines following remarks by an ex-Russian president. Here are the subs in the American fleet - CNN
articles.description: US President Donald Trump said Friday he was ordering two US Navy nuclear submarines to “appropriate regions,” in response to remarks by Dmitry Medvedev, Russia’s former president and current deputy chairman of its Security Council.

articles.title: American Eagle Responds to the Sydney Sweeney Ad Backlash and Branding Experts Are Mixed - WWD
articles.description: American Eagle Outfitters has faced a firestorm of controversy and global news coverage for its 'Sydney Sweeney Has Great Jeans' campaign.
